Class RedBlackTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

java.lang.Object

abdcelik.Trees.BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E>
abdcelik.Trees.RedBlackTree<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The data type of items stored in the tree. Must be Comparable
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchTree<E>, java.io.Serializable
public class RedBlackTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends BinarySearchTreeWithRotate<E>
Implementation of a Red-Black Tree Data Structure

    • moveBlackDown

      private void moveBlackDown​(RedBlackTree.RedBlackNode<E> localRoot)
      Check to see whether both children of the given node are red. If so, make them black and change the localRoot's color to red.
      Parameters:
      localRoot - The node to check whether both children are red or not
